column4: X appears to (somewhat) randomly crash on me about once ever two days. Is there something I should be doing to get a better handle on this? Is there a log file that's written somewhere when X crashes that might provide a clue?
what does the crash look like? does it freeze? which chipset?
I get kicked back to the login screen; nvidia graphics, proprietary driver, jaunty
could be the gdm crashing. as mzz said, let's start with Xorg.0.log...
